name: Reach for the Heavens
description:
Plot

Reach for the Heavens is about an alternate world where the Tower of Babel was completed and people have reached the Heavens. God wasn't happy about it and cast the builders down and placed a curse on the Tower. No matter how far they climb up the Heavens will never be reached. But humans being stubborn believe they can, so God sent angels to smite those who dare. 

*Intro cutscenes are included in the desktop versions. You can watch the intro through the youtube video

Controls

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Shoot
